extensionDescription.message: Adds context menu item 'Bookmark Tab Here' to Bookmarks Menus as an alternative bookmarking method.

BTH_menuitemText.description: Title of BTH context menu item.

BTHLG1.message: When Accessing via a Bookmark Folder's Context Menu

BTHfolderTop.message: Insert Bookmark at Top of Menu

BTHfolderBottom.message: Insert Bookmark at Bottom of Menu

BTH_allTabs.message: 'Shift-Click' Bookmarks All Tabs in Current Window
